alert.note: Alert for Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 7:23PM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The western third of Sweetwater County including Green River and Rock Springs. * WHEN...Until 5 AM Tuesday. The heaviest snow is expected this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, including Interstate 80, could become closed especially east and south of Rock Springs. Travel could be difficult. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero tonight and Tuesday could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
